product.shortDescription: Elevate your carry-on aesthetic with the Virtuosa Expandable Carry On. Featuring expansion, a TSA integrated lock, RightHeight™ handle, dual spinner wheels, and sleek leather-like accents, this case is the ultimate stylish addition!

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Shell material is made of vacuum formed polycarbonate, a highly impact-resistant plastic that is strong and lightweight.
Strap that fits over most upright luggage handles for easy transportation
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Virtuosa Carry-On Spinner | Modern Style Carry-On | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: Travel in style with the Virtuosa Expandable Carry-On, featuring timeless leather accents for modern jet-setters.
product.headlineDescription:
Elevate your carry-on aesthetic with the Virtuosa Expandable Carry On. Featuring expansion, a TSA integrated lock, RightHeight™ handle, dual spinner wheels, and sleek leather-like accents, this case is the ultimate stylish addition.

  • Overall Dimensions: 23 in. x 15 in. x 10 in.
  • Weight: 6.39 lbs
